ActJudges Act
SubjectMaureen A. Thackray ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Allan D. Thackray **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to MAUREEN A. THACKRAY, widow of the Hon. Allan D. Thackray, Judge of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, effective November 12, 2012.
AttachmentsAttachment
